desc: Jurassic Coast Fossils offers fossils from the UK including ammonites, marine reptiles such ichthyosaurs and plesiosaurs, fish, crinoids and more. We also offer a range of high-quality fossil replicas and fossil jewellery from the cradle of palaeontology. Most of our fossils come from Lyme Regis and Charmouth.

layout.text: We offer a range of fossils from the world-famous Jurassic Coast, one of the best places in the world for fossils. The coast offers up over 185 million years of fossils representing a beautiful slice of Earth's prehistory.
